certmanager_old_letsencrypt_app_detected:
Yunohost detected that the 'letsencrypt' app is installed, which conflits with the new built-in certificate management features in Yunohost. If you wish to use the new built-in features, please run the following commands to migrate your installation:

    yunohost app remove letsencrypt
    yunohost domain cert-install

N.B.: this will attempt to re-install certificates for all domains with a Let's Encrypt certificate or self-signed certificate
